parameters.name: Input
parameters.description: FASTA/Q input file. default is STDIN

parameters.name: Output
parameters.description: FASTA/Q output file. default is STDOUT

parameters.name: Adapter
parameters.description: ADAPTER string. default is CCTTAAGG (dummy adapter)

parameters.name: Bases keep
parameters.description: Keep the adapter and N bases after it. (using '-d 0' is the same as not using '-d' at all. which is the default).

parameters.name: Min lenght
parameters.description: Discard sequences shorter than N nucleotides. default is 5)
